favourite.article: I love this hymn very much. The melody is so sweet and not at all distracting from the words. When I sing it, I can only be sincere in my prayer to the Lord--just loving, seeking, and pursuing only You!

This hymn is really great! It refreshed my love toward and my pursuit of our dear Lord Jesus! Praise Him, our worship to Him and great many thanks to you and to the dear saints who have compiled and sang and recorded this hymn.
